description:
The rebels led by Kosho and Yoko take Shoko’s castle and arrest Shoko.  Yoko decides to let Shoko live for confessing the corruption in higher places of the government.  The castle is, however, already surrounded by Shoko’s soldiers and the State Army’s main force is arriving soon.  Suzu sends Asano to get Kantai’s help in Meikaku but he gets stopped by Summer Officers.  When the rebels try to force their way out of the castle at dawn, the strong State’s cavalries strike.  Then, Kantai’s force arrives to help them.  It turns out that Kantai has a bigger plan than arresting Shoko.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 14
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Juuyon Shou
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 14
風の万里 黎明の空 十四章
